data.fullContent: A wide range of animals and insects live in Texas. It is the home to 65 species of mammals, 213 species of reptiles and amphibians, and the greatest diversity of bird live in the United States-590 native species in all. At least 12 species have been introduced and now reproduce freely in Texas.
data.answer: 德克萨斯州生活着各种各样的动物和昆虫。它是65种哺乳动物、213种爬行动物和两栖动物的家园，也是美国鸟类物种最丰富的地方——总共有590种本土物种。至少有12个物种被引进，现在在德州自由繁殖。
